nodes.text: Star Wars: The Last Jedi – The Official Collector's Edition

Star Wars: The Last Jedi – The Official Collector's Edition is a commemorative issue of Star Wars Insider that covers various elements from Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi. It was released on December 19, 2017.

It had three cover variants: a newsstand edition, a comic store edition, and a hardcover edition. All three covers were based on various promotional poster art for the film (the teaser poster, the Japanese poster, and the US movie poster, respectively).

Star Wars: The Last Jedi: The Official Collector's Edition includes profiles of the heroes, villains, droids, and ships of the heroic forces of the Resistance and the sinister First Order. Stunning photography and concept art combine to make this an essential volume for all fans of the Star Wars saga.
